messages.title: You can put trust back into politics with Bridget Fox
Gordon Brown's Labour MP who has let us down
messages.content: After 13 years in Government, Gordon Brown and Labour have let us down. Now, 1 in 10 people caught carrying a weapon only get a caution. Enough is enough.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Bridget is calling for 3000 extra police to help make people feel safe. Lib Dems on the Council have already got extra police to patrol local crime hotspots.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The Conservatives cannot win here - No other result is possible.

politicalExperience.achievements: Have already got extra police to patrol local crime hotspots.

images.caption: Our hardworking local champion Bridget Fox
